## IControllerPointerUpEvent interface

Pointer up event for camera controllers.

Triggered when a mouse, pen, or touch pointer is released.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerPointerUpEvent extends IControllerMouseEvent<'pointerup'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerMouseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollermouseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'pointerup'&gt;
